title: Remote Application Issues
description: Troubleshooting login, freezing, and disconnection in remote apps.

steps.title: Session Reset
steps.instruction: Logout and log back in. Restart your system.

steps.title: Internet Check
steps.instruction: Verify your internet stability as remote apps require constant connectivity.

steps.title: Alternative Test
steps.instruction: Try logging in from another system to see if the issue is profile-specific.

steps.title: Community Check
steps.instruction: Confirm if others are facing same issue. If yes, raise an IT ticket immediately. Do not share credentials.
